programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Mudslide - It's a very rainy day at the Go Jet Academy and the Go Jetters are teaching the Cadets some crucial Go Jetter skills.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep33
programme.desc: The Sphinx, Egypt - Glitch and the Grimbots are on holiday in Egypt where the Grimbots bury the Great Sphinx in sand, leaving only its head showing.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S14 Ep7
programme.desc: Henry's Health and Safety - Henry causes chaos after talking to Victor about health and safety.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep26
programme.desc: Rainbow Race - The changeable weather means Rainbow has to leave before finishing his story. Sarah & Duck try to find out how the story ends.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep25
programme.desc: Donkey Jump - Sarah & Duck try to help Donkey get his jumping confidence back by building a surprise for him in their back garden.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora S1 Ep51
programme.desc: Harvest Feast - Nelly and Nora organise a feast to celebrate the good summer on the farm.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Dog Loves Amazing - While trying to solve a puzzle, Dog and Pug end up looking for a Minotaur in an ancient maze. After a number of false turns, they reach the centre and find the friendly Minotaur.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Backyard Beach - Monty and Stan are packing the car for a trip to the beach, but when the car breaks down and the trip is cancelled, Monty wonders whether you can have can have a fun day out without ever leaving your home.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S1 Ep6
programme.desc: It's time to bake - Gran Gran and JoJo are excited to bake a batch of Great Gran Gran's signature Saint Lucian banana bread, but there's a problem - they don't know how long to bake it for!

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep38
programme.desc: Meow Mountain - Tinpotown's "eye in the sky" helicopter Pilot Po doesn't want to take his eyes of his new pet kitten.

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep37
programme.desc: Wet Paint - Tinpo discovers a way to get around the wet floor in the garage to retrieve the newly painted Vehi-Tools before it rains.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep41
programme.desc: Bin Night - Bluey, Bingo and Dad always take out the bins. Over a few weeks, Bingo tells Dad about a new kid at kindy who is mean to her and Mum offers some good advice.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep15
programme.desc: The Pizza Badge - Duggee wants to try out his new pizza oven, so while he makes the bases the Squirrels each put on all the toppings they like best. Some of their combinations are... interesting!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep14
programme.desc: The Train Badge - Duggee is playing with his train set. Choo-choo! Hennie arrives and she has a train too. The squirrels ask if they can play with it. You can't play with it; you can play IN it says Hennie!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep13
programme.desc: The Dancing Bug Badge - When a dancing bug lands on Duggee's head, he can't stop dancing. The Squirrels see that it's a tiny hillbilly bug with a fiddle. And what's more, he's got a band with him - the Hillbilly Bug Band.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep32
programme.desc: Everglades National Park, Florida - The Go Jetters save the Florida Everglades when hungry alligators chase Glitch's picnic.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep31
programme.desc: Timgad Ruins, Algeria - The Go Jetters visit Timgad in Algeria, but someone is playing games with their click-ons.

programme.title: The Numtums S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Faster, Higher, Funnier - It's the annual Gumnut Games and the Numtums compete to see who can jump the highest, lift the heaviest and walk the furthest on a tightrope.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep91
programme.desc: Footprints - Tinky Winky, Dipsy and LaaLaa follow a trail of muddy footprints and find Po in bed with very muddy feet. The Noo-Noo cleans off the mud.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S3 Ep16
programme.desc: Shoes - Dee encourages a friend to say 'shoes' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! Dee see lots of different types of shoes - flashy shoes, dashy shoes, shiny shoes and even flying shoes!

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Say Cheese - Mae-Mae accidentally loses Phoebe's special photo album and must use Zip's camera to replace it.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep24
programme.desc: Bee Story - There's some funny 'buzzy-ness' going on in OKIDO. Where are all the bees? Messy and friends meet bee royalty and save the day!

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Dino Saurus Games - Whilst playing animal races in the backyard, Jeanie tells Monty that all dinosaurs were slow, leading Monty and Jimmy Jones to imagine traveling back millions of years to see if they can find a fast dinosaur.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep39
programme.desc: The Sleepover - A sleepover with their cousin means Bluey and Bingo get to stay up late! But when Muffin shows up exhausted after missing her nap, the girls get more fun than they bargained for.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep36
programme.desc: The Exercise Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels set off on a warm-up run together. The Squirrels are feeling sleepy, but they are told that a bit of exercise will wake them up!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep35
programme.desc: The Music Video Badge - The Squirrels are having fun playing a song they made, but they wish that they could see themselves perform. Duggee has a great suggestion, and they learn how to be creative.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep34
programme.desc: The List Badge - Duggee has lost the list he made for the Squirrel's activities for the day at Squirrel Club. After a quick lesson on what a list is, they are happy to help Duggee recreate his.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep36
programme.desc: The Leshan Giant Buddha, China - The Go Jetters master the art of mindfulness to save the Giant Buddha of Leshan in China.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep35
programme.desc: The Great Pacific Garbage Patch - When a storm washes up plastic litter onto the Academy beach, the Go Jetters leave Ubercorn, Grandmaster Glitch and the cadets behind and head to the North Pacific Ocean in Jet Pad.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep38
programme.desc: Copycat - Bluey's having fun copying everything Dad says and does, but the game takes a serious turn when Bluey finds a hurt budgie and they have to make an emergency trip to the vet.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep37
programme.desc: The Adventure - Princesses, horses and magic wands. Bluey and Chloe can play any role they want, when they embark on an adventure to save their playground kingdom from the Greedy Queen.

programme.title: Andy's Aquatic Adventures S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Andy and the Galapagos Sea Lions - Andy blasts off in his safari sub to the Galapagos to see how sea lions deal with flies.

programme.title: Grace's Amazing Machines S3 Ep16
programme.desc: Wind Machines - Grace looks at three amazing wind machines: a glider, a kite buggy and a solar orbiter.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep255
programme.desc: SpongeBob's Big Birthday Blowout Part 2 - SpongeBob and Patrick tour the surface world, while the rest of Bikini Bottom prepares a surprise for SpongeBob!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep232
programme.desc: Mustard O' Mine - When The Krusty Krab runs out of mustard, Mr. Krabs sends SpongeBob, Patrick and Squidward to dig up some more!

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep403
programme.desc: Alvin's Assistant - Kevin agrees to be Alvin's assistant to get closer to the music industry, but ends up running errands instead.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep410
programme.desc: Big Bro Theodore / No Putts, No Glory - When Theodore mistakenly thinks he's the oldest brother, he tries to be a better role model for Alvin and Simon. // Alvin tricks Theodore into believing he's great at mini golf which backfires when Theo signs up for a tournament.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep411
programme.desc: Granny Awards / Sick Day - Dave is thrilled when he thinks he's nominated for a Grammy, but it's actually an award for aging musicians. // Alvin and Kevin pretend to be sick to miss school and sneak off to the Dagarack Convention.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S13 Ep275
programme.desc: Food PBBFT! Truck / Upturn Girls - SpongeBob and Squidward try to sell krabby patties from a food truck in the darkest depths of the ocean. // Pearl and Narlene have a whales' day out in the big city.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep107
programme.desc: The Haunting of Star House / Who's a Big Boy? - Patrick hires cheap ghosts to haunt his house, but he ends up getting just what he paid for. // Patrick hits an unnatural growth spurt in his late adolescence.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S13 Ep276
programme.desc: Say 'Awww!'/ Patrick the Mailman - Frustrated that he's seen as cute instead of evil, Plankton builds a robot to punish anyone who says "aww!" // Patrick crushes the mailman, so he and SpongeBob deliver the mail around Bikini Bottom.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep234
programme.desc: ChefBob - When Mr. Krabs puts in an open kitchen, SpongeBob gets stage fright and has to invent a new persona.

programme.title: Kamp Koral: SpongeBob's Under Years S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Camp Spirit / Help Not Wanted - SpongeBob, Patrick and Sandy befriend a visiting ghost camper. // Patrick's dad unexpectedly visits Kamp Koral.

programme.title: The Loud House S06 Ep605
programme.desc: The Taunting Hour / Musical Chairs - After Lincoln tries to help Lynn get over a heckler at her soccer game, the Louds realize they all have critics. // Lincoln convinces his teacher, Mr. Bolhofner, to join the Doo-Dads in order to get a better seat in class.

programme.title: The Loud House S06 Ep606
programme.desc: A Bug's Strife / All the Rage - Dad tears the house apart trying to find the cricket ruining his peaceful day alone in the house. // Tired of getting pummeled during dodgeball, Lincoln and the gang use Clyde's untapped rage without him knowing.

programme.title: The Loud House S06 Ep607
programme.desc: Scoop Snoop / Eye Can't - The Action News Team struggles to find out how Katherine Mulligan is scooping their news leads. // Trying to avoid a trip to the eye doctor, Lisa makes a new pair of glasses that actually makes her eyesight worse.

programme.title: Transformers: EarthSpark S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Classified - G.H.O.S.T. Special Agent Schloder pursues Twitch after mistaking her for a Decepticon. Meanwhile, Dot is put through G.H.O.S.T. orientation, where she learns that her employer's intentions may not be what they seem.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep121
programme.desc: The Patrick Show Sells Out / Neptune's Ball - The Patrick Show gets competing sponsors. // The star family visits King Neptune's palace.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep235
programme.desc: Plankton Paranoia / Library Cards - Plankton hasn't tried to steal the secret formula in a while...and that's making Mr. Krabs nervous! // When Patrick discovers the pineapple's library, SpongeBob introduces him to the wonderful world of book learning!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep244
programme.desc: The Krusty Slammer - Mr. Krabs turns the Krusty Krab into a jailhouse after Plankton breaks the law, but crime only pays for so long.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep217
programme.desc: Spot Returns / The Check-Up - When his pet amoeba Spot has puppies, Plankton decides to use them in another of his nefarious plots. // Mr. Krabs is too scared to get his physical, but if he doesn't pass, the Krusty Krab will be shut down!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Bunstoppable - While preparing bao for the Chinese Cultural Fair, Sid and Adelaide face off against time-hopping bandits!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Cursed! - Celebrity psychic Ernesto Estrella deems Great Lakes City to be bad luck and Abuela believes him!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep120
programme.desc: What's Love Gato Do With It? / Dial M. For Mustard - After a magician hypnotizes Bobby into thinking he's a cat, the family needs to snap him out of it! // Ronnie Anne and her friends uncover a town mystery: what happened to Bruno's hot dog cart?

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep201
programme.desc: The Kid Plays in the Picture / Achy Breaky Art - Carl's love for toys gets him caught up in a whirlwind toy review career. // Frida's art gets a bad review, the kids try to stage a new auction to lift her spirits.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep255
programme.desc: SpongeBob's Big Birthday Blowout Part 2 - SpongeBob and Patrick tour the surface world, while the rest of Bikini Bottom prepares a surprise for SpongeBob!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep256
programme.desc: SpongeBob in Randomland / SpongeBob's Bad Habit - SpongeBob and Squidward take a delivery to a dreaded town where the laws of logic no longer apply. // SpongeBob can't stop biting his nails, but he also can't figure out why!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep257
programme.desc: Handemonium / Breakin' - Plankton's giant Chum Bucket glove runs wild in town, but SpongeBob has a handy friend to help them out. // SpongeBob takes his first break ever at work, but how will he spend his precious time?

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep258
programme.desc: Boss for a Day / The Goofy Newbie - Mr. Krabs has an accident and leaves SpongeBob in charge of the Krusty Krab. What could go wrong? // Patrick takes a job at the Goofy Goober when he finds out the employees get free ice cream.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Gas Station Vacation / Bunny the Barbarian - The Star Family heads to their favorite resort. // Bunny goes on a mid-day adventure to a forgotten age.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep118
programme.desc: The Patterfly Effect - Patrick messes with the space-time continuum.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep206
programme.desc: The Midnight Stranger - When kung fu is outlawed, Po turns to donning a mask to fight crime.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep207
programme.desc: The Po Who Cried Ghost - Po's worst childhood fears come true when he comes face to face with hopping ghosts!

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S01 Ep101
programme.desc: The Boy in the Iceberg - When a young waterbender, named Katara, and her brother, Sokka, discover a giant iceberg while fishing for food around their homestead at the South Pole, they discover that there is a boy, named Aang, inside.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep308
programme.desc: Best Foes - Kowalski invents an enemy detector but it doesn't work. Old enemies are now friends & old friends are now enemies.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep303
programme.desc: Operation: Big Blue Marble - The Penguins are faced with a global battle when their specialty food-making machine belches out a toxic cloud that threatens not just the zoo, not just the city, but the earth itself!

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep304
programme.desc: Feline Fervor / Action Reaction - King Julien is literally bounced out of his kingdom and onto the New York streets. // Skipper is forced to live his worst nightmare when hes doused with Inflatium and stress causes him to blow up like a balloon.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Side Hustle / Burt Speaks - Parker picks up a bunch of side hustles in order to afford the perfect gift for Angus. // Parker believes Burt can speak via popping bubble wrap, and pretty soon, the whole mountain seeks Burt's wisdom.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S02 Ep206
programme.desc: The Blind Bandit - In search for an Earthbending teacher for Aang, the kids go to an underground Earthbending tournament where they encounter Toph, a blind, but powerful Earthbender.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Zuko Alone - Traveling without Uncle now, Zuko wanders alone into an Earth Kingdom town where he bonds with a local boy. Meanwhile, Zuko is haunted by memories of his own youth.

programme.title: Best and Bester S01 Ep125
programme.desc: Pulling Power / Home Security - Best wins a competition to pitch his story ideas to world famous author A N Other, and finds that three's a crowd. // Best and Bester housesit for Diamondo and realise that there's more to it than massage chairs and unlimited snacks.

programme.title: Best and Bester S01 Ep126
programme.desc: One Better Day - Part 1 / One Better Day - Part 2 - Bettervale is celebrating "Better Day" but Best and Bester manage to anger the townsfolk by causing mischief again. // After a period of exile Best and Bester return hoping to patch things up with their neighbours and with each other.

programme.title: Corn & Peg S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Lights, Camera, Gallop / Bouncy Knights - Corn and Peg make a ''Best of'' Galloping Grove video after Mayor Montagu enters the town in a contest. // At Galloping Grove's Renaissance Fair, Corn and Peg do-good by finding items to repair the bouncy castle.

programme.title: Rise of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles S01 Ep111
programme.desc: The Purple Jacket / Pizza Pit - An evil tech club lures Donnie with the promise of a gorgeous purple jacket. // It's Pizza Week, the greatest week of the year, but the Turtles' favorite pizza joints keep getting taken out.

programme.title: Wallykazam! S01 Ep116
programme.desc: A Tiny Problem - When a magic flower shrinks Wally and Norville, they meet a tiny new friend named Wendy Whittle, who leads them on a quest to get big again.

programme.title: Abby Hatcher S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Curly and the Sock Doll / In the Park - Something is leaving a bad stink around the Hotel. Abby discovers its Curly's beloved sock doll! // Princess Flug doesn't want to get dirty in the park, but she also doesn't want to be left out of her friends' fun.

programme.title: Abby Hatcher S01 Ep108

programme.title: Razor
programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. An international team of reporters will follow the guidance of Occam's Razor - the principle that the simplest explanation is the best one. RAZOR will show that we are already ""living in the future"!

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep9
programme.desc: Sr. 33 - We meet twin brother artists whose digital and high-tech artwork is inspired by the tropical flora around them.

programme.title: Landline Summer Ep17
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - This summer, we bring you more of our favourite Landline stories from 2023. Increasing production of the premium delicacy marron; and Australia's new apple, the Bravo.

programme.title: Regional Roundup Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - More of our favourite regional stories from 2023. How one NSW farmer turned big floods into big business, a cosmic spectacle that lit up southern skies, and new contender for man's best friend - a goat that thinks it's a dog.

programme.title: ABC News Afternoons Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Stephanie Borys presents the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Stephanie Borys brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events, with the latest breaking news, in depth coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to bring you up to speed on what's going on.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 4 - Bricklayer Greg and his partner Emma tear down their South Melbourne laneway townhouse to build a 3-level home out of brick. They invite their extended family to help out with Emma's parents assigned the entire ground floor.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 33 - We meet a fungal ecologist who can measure the health of her neighbourhood parks and her garden by the different fungi growing there.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep8
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's stories. Plus reporters investigating issues that matter to you. Presented by Stephanie Borys.

programme.title: 7.30 Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - David Speers presents Australia's premier daily current affairs show, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. (Return)

programme.title: ABC News Tonight Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - More news, more often - the home of breaking news and in-depth coverage of the issues that matter. The ABC's network of reporters cover important stories and bring you news and information you need. Presented by Yvonne Yong.

programme.title: Australian Story Ep30
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Meet the violin virtuosos from Brisbane who ditched a classical career to create an online music comedy act. Now Brett Yang and Eddy Chen have gone viral and are playing sell-out concerts around the world.

programme.title: ABC Nightly News Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Stay in touch with the latest breaking news and comprehensive coverage of the day's top stories. With reporters in more places, ABC News connects communities and tells the stories that matter to you. Presented by Yvonne Yong.

programme.title: Sydney to Hobart Yacht Race Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Highlights of the 2023 Sydney to Hobart Yacht Race, starting in Sydney Harbour on Boxing Day, with days of world class racing down the south coast of NSW and across the Tasman Sea to Hobart.

programme.title: The World Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Know what's going on in our world. Yvonne Yong presents the latest international news and a complete look at today's events with reports from ABC News correspondents and interviews with experts, commentators and guests.

programme.title: Foreign Correspondent Ep11
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - North Korean defectors overcome huge odds to escape to a new life in the south but instead of finding happiness they are often overcome with loneliness and isolation. Still living in fear, they rarely speak out publicly.

programme.title: Alone Australia Ep8
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Survival in the Tasmanian wilderness is proving just one part of the challenge for participants. The emotional isolation is weighing heavily, and for one it proves too much.

programme.title: Beyond Awesome Ep7
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Samoa's Geek Girls: Cybersecurity expert, Tagilima Neemia, is determined to bust the myth that boys are better at science and technology. With the global technology sector booming, she helps Samoan girls get tech-savvy.

programme.title: ABC Late News Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Know the latest on the day's top stories, as Jade Barker brings you a comprehensive roundup of the news of the day. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: 7.30 Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - David Speers presents Australia's premier daily current affairs show, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. (Return)

programme.title: Aussie Bull Catchers Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - When Kurt ignores the advice of his team, his muster begins to look shaky. On the cusp of completing their biggest job, Liz leads them to the finish line. Clarry is determined to meet the cattle target for his new clients.

programme.title: Sydney to Hobart Yacht Race Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Highlights of the 2023 Sydney to Hobart Yacht Race, starting in Sydney Harbour on Boxing Day, with days of world class racing down the south coast of NSW and across the Tasman Sea to Hobart.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 4 - Bricklayer Greg and his partner Emma tear down their South Melbourne laneway townhouse to build a 3-level home out of brick. They invite their extended family to help out with Emma's parents assigned the entire ground floor.

programme.title: Catalyst: Are We Killing Our Koalas? Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 22 - The koala is a national icon on the path to extinction. Professor Tim Flannery investigates the story behind the headlines, meeting researchers working to understand the threats koalas face, and how we can avoid them.

programme.title: Australian Story Ep30
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Meet the violin virtuosos from Brisbane who ditched a classical career to create an online music comedy act. Now Brett Yang and Eddy Chen have gone viral and are playing sell-out concerts around the world.

programme.title: Beyond Awesome Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Indonesia's Comedy Campaigner: Sakdiyah Ma'ruf, Indonesia's first female Muslim stand-up comedian. She uses humor to dismantle stereotypes and challenge fundamentalism. Off-stage, she helps women find their voice.

programme.title: 7.30 Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - David Speers presents Australia's premier daily current affairs show, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. (Return)

programme.title: The World Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Know what's going on in our world. Yvonne Yong presents the latest international news and a complete look at today's events with reports from ABC News correspondents and interviews with experts, commentators and guests.

programme.title: Landline Summer Ep18
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - This summer, we bring you more of our favourite Landline stories from 2023. A sky high future for mustering; and improving abattoir safety and efficiency through technology.

programme.title: Regional Roundup Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Australian farmers cash in on the push for sustainable fashion, feral animals threaten one of Australia's most iconic national parks, and we meet the young ringers with big dreams at the remote Borroloola bush rodeo.

programme.title: The Business: Summer Special Ep182
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - From PwC to Optus and Qantas, corporate Australia faced a reckoning in 2023. In this special summer episode of The Business, Kirsten Aiken looks back at the stories that rocked corporate Australia in the past year.

programme.title: News Breakfast Ep7
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Be the first to know the latest overnight developments, breaking news and the top stories this morning. Michael Rowland and Emma Rebellato bring you news and interviews, Rani Hayman with sport and Nate Byrne with weather.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings Ep7

programme.title: Choices - Dare to dream
programme.desc: Choices - Dare to Dream: How to become a respected ballet dancer. In his village in Haryana, Pawan Kumars family wants him to get a job in a factory. But in his heart, he dreams of becoming something different, something "you dont do as a man - a ballet dancer. Making a living from ballet might seem unrealistic and gender norms discourage him from giving it his all. Internationally acclaimed choreographer Ashley Lobo invites Pawan to his studio in Mumbai.

programme.title: Tomorrow Today
programme.desc: The Science Magazine - Viruses and some bacteria make us sick, but many can be surprisingly useful. The bacteria in a mother's intestines gives babies protection before they're even born, while viruses could help to recycle valuable natural resources in e-waste.

programme.title: J-Melo
programme.desc: Join May J. for Japanese music! This week, Mashiko Tatsuro (a singer-songwriter who made his songwriting debut 21 years ago) and EBiDAN (a collective of young artists) are coming to chat and perform.

programme.title: The World Heritage Sites In Japan
programme.desc: Shirakami-Sanchi, or the Shirakami Mountain Range, is home to one of the world's largest beech forests. Its pristine environment hosts a variety of wildlife, as well as a group of hunter-gatherers.

programme.title: Pottery The Times Demand
programme.desc: Aichi / Kataoka Mami (curator) Tokoname, a pottery town with over 900 years of history, creates products appropriate for the times. Kataoka finds the beauty that's present in functional objects.

programme.title: Learn Japanese From The News
programme.desc: In October the island of Miyajima in Hiroshima Prefecture started charging tourists a 100 yen visitor tax. City officials expect this tax to generate 104 million yen in revenues by next March.

programme.title: Culture Crossroads
programme.desc: Ren, from Vietnam, started a guesthouse in Nagano Prefecture. Her belief is: a welcoming environment leads to a more livable community. We take a look at interactions between Ren and the townspeople.

programme.title: Hello! NHK World-Japan
programme.desc: This time we introduce "Zero Waste Life," which shows people around Japan who strive for a life without waste under the traditional philosophy of "MOTTAINAI." We present 3 selected episodes.

programme.title: The World Heritage Sites In Japan
programme.desc: Shirakawa-go is one of Japan's snowiest regions, famous for its traditional thatched-roof Gassho-style homes. Every detail of life here is reflected in the cooperative bond shared by residents.

programme.title: Natural Stone Walls
programme.desc: Shiga / Nagayama Yuko (architect) For 400 years, a group of stonemasons have been building walls using natural stone. Nagayama learns how a stone's qualities are assessed and utilized.

programme.desc: This program visits places across Japan to introduce the charms of their local daily life and festivals fostered by the nation's long history.

programme.title: Nun'S Seasonal Calendar
programme.desc: In this episode, we learn about the winter dates of Shokan and Daikan. The nuns teach us how to make seasonal rice porridge with seven herbs, kan-koji fermented rice and dried vegetables.

programme.title: Time-Lapse Journey
programme.desc: Kamikochi is a beautiful mountainous region in Nagano Prefecture that's 1,500m above sea level. With a mirror-like pond and rime ice, see the frozen beauty of Kamikochi through time-lapse photography.

programme.title: UFC 294: Makhachev vs. Volkanovski 2
programme.desc: Prelims - On October 21, the UFC returns to Abu Dhabi, where two of the top fighters in the world, pound for pound, will meet again as Islam Makhachev defends his lightweight title against featherweight champion Alexander Volkanovski in the main event of UFC 294 at Etihad Arena. In February, the pair met for the first time, engaging in a Fight of the Year candidate that left fans demanding a rematch. Now Makhachev, who has won 12 straight, will attempt to make it two in a row over the Aussie star, who is hungry to even the score with the 155-pound king. Plus, middleweight sensation Khamzat Chimaev welcomes former welterweight champion Kamaru Usman to the division in a fight with serious title implications at 185 pounds

programme.desc: Prelims - After a spectacular UFC debut that saw him end Dustin Stoltzfus night in just 19 seconds, Abus Magomedov will step squarely into the main event spotlight on July 1 when he faces perennial middleweight contender Sean Strickland in the headliner of UFC Fight Night at the APEX in Las Vegas. A Top 10 stalwart fighting in his adopted hometown, Strickland has already won three UFC main events over Uriah Hall, Jack Hermansson and Nassourdine Imavov, and now hell look to halt the rise of Magomedov, who brings a three-fight winning streak into this intriguing bout.
